alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central De Soto, Red River, southeastern Caddo, southwestern Bienville and southeastern Bossier Parishes through 1115 AM CST... At 1030 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Haughton to 10 miles east of Mansfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coushatta, Ringgold, Martin, Hall Summit, Castor, Edgefield, Jamestown, Carmel, Caspiana, Grand Bayou, Lake Bistineau South, Elm Grove, Loggy Bayou, Womack, Ninock, Crichton, Mc Dade and Armistead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River
